text: taaki log naseehat va ibarat haasil karen ai aulaade aadam (hoshiyaar raho) kaheen tumhen shaitaan bahaka na de jis tarah usane tumhaare baap maan aadam va havva ko behasht se nikalava chhoda usee ne un donon se (behashtee) poshaak utaravaee taaki un donon ko unakee sharmagaahen dikha de vah aur usaka qunaba zaroor tumhen is tarah dekhata rahata hai ki tum unhe nahin dekhane paate hamane shaitaanon ko unheen logon ka rapheeq qaraar diya hai
